name: Line Leader!
description:
The crowd is waiting for boarding the helicopter. It's time for you to lead them a way. People of different colors need to board the corresponding helicopter. But the lines can't be crossed, think it wisely how to lead them.

And please note, don't drop people off the roof, you should take full advantage of the areas then!

Now we'll leave it to you, thank you, Line Leader!

Features:
* Suitable for all ages
* Use your brain to solve the puzzles.
* Free to play, play it anytime anywhere
